name: SpeederRun
description:
SpeederRun is a small and fun video game for racing and speed lovers.

Ideal for casual gamers who want to spend some time every now and then.

Linked to the Video game there will be a contest with a possibility of winning prizes in gold coins.

The prize pool could be around € 10,000

The winner who achieves the highest score within a certain date wins, followed by the second and third place (exactly as it happens in sports events)
